name: Ruins Defender
description:
This game was recently submitted to the game jam "Your Game Jam Trial" and was created over a two-week period by two game development enthusiasts.

Credits and mentions
  • Game programming - Antonio Ríos (@antoniorv6)
  • Level design - José Ángel DB (@JoseAngelDB)
Mentions for the used free assets pack
  • Character art & Animations - Luiz Melo (https://luizmelo.itch.io/)
  • Environment assets - Maxparatta (https://maxparata.itch.io/)
  • Music - Darren Curtis Music (https://www.darrencurtismusic.com/freemusicpage1)
